Package ohos.utils.geo

Utility classes commonly used by controls.

This package provides common utility classes with their constant/variable definitions as well as classes for representing rectangles and points.

Since:
5
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DimensFloat
    Represents any paired values related to the X and Y axes.
    Point
    A utility class that creates instances for recording pixels.
    Rect
    Represents a rectangle area.
    RectFloat
    Indicates a rectangle that uses float coordinates.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Rect.RotationEnum
    Indicates the rotation angle.
    RectFloat.RotationEnum
    Indicates the rotation angle.
